/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Among these structures, a tall apartment building stands out, reaching towards the sky.

In the distance, mountains rise against the horizon, their majestic peaks adding a sense of depth and scale to the image. The overall scene is a harmonious blend of urban life and natural beauty, a characteristic feature of Beijing.
